nodes.text: Barab Ingots (also called Barab ore ingots) were rare lightsaber crystals found on the planet Barab I, found inside the ore littering the planet's radiation-baked surface. Though the radiation on the surface made it difficult to find these crystals, a few managed to locate Barab ingots suitable for use as focusing crystals. When used in a lightsaber, the ingots produced a clear blade that burned almost to the point of losing its cohesion.

The constant infusion of radiation from Barab I's surface caused a Barab ingot to produce a blade that burned like fire, even causing the target of the blade to catch fire. The color of a Barab ingot blade varied, with ingots of every common blade color having been found.

In "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures", the Barab bar has nothing to do with lightsabers and instead is crafting material that can be used to craft various things. It also appears to be a rectangle instead of a crystal.
